short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces occurences of Yahoo, Bing and Google related text and images with Yahbingle related text and images on webpages you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces all Yahoo, Bing and Google related text and images on webpages you visit with Yahbingle related text and images.
